title: Connection Problems in OCE
body: When will OCE get better services? I checked that OCE is still a growing community but the amount of players with over 500-1000+ ping is just many. Anyone having the same thoughts on this that Riot should also improve the OCE community servers?

replies.body:
I normally get 50 ping. People who get lower than that have external factors effecting them, which is fair enough because most of the time it's the ISP being a little bitch, not the player.

Tony Abbot sucks.
i am suffering from the lagging everyday esp after 5pm
